actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should defer granting any additional pardons until after all the facts about the Watergate affair have been revealed by the unfettered operation of the criminal justice system.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should defer granting any additional pardons until after the facts about the Watergate affair have been revealed by the unfettered operation of the criminal justice system.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should defer granting any additional pardons until after all the facts about the Watergate affair have been revealed by the unfettered operation of the criminal justice system.
